name: text-to-string-for-javascript-converter
description:
This package changes selected Text to javascript String
 with ctrl-alt-e and will try to convert back with ctrl-alt-w.
 The string to convert can contain variable name which indicated by ":" 
 example

A:B\nC

 will convert to 

"A" + B + "" + \n "C"
readme:
# javascript-string package

This package change selected Text to javascript String with ctrl-alt-e and will try to convert back with ctrl-alt-w.
The string to convert can contain variable name which indicated by ":"
example

A:B
C

will convert to

"A" + B + "" +
"C"


![A screenshot of your spankin' package](https://f.cloud.github.com/assets/69169/2290250/c35d867a-a017-11e3-86be-cd7c5bf3ff9b.gif)
